Text:
You can get the binkw32.dll file from here:

http://www.dll-files.com/binkw32.zip?0WFeU0cDdW

1. First Extract the zip file
2. Copy the binkw32.dll file to either the C:WindowsSystem32 folder or to the games install directory
3. If your still getting any other dll errors then update your DirectX
